title: Network throttling
summary: Network throttling is an intentional slowing down of internet speed. In web performance, network throttling, or network condition emulation, it is used to emulate low bandwidth conditions experienced by likely a large segment of a site's target user base.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
